title: 7 Natural Juice Recipes For Healthy Living - Muscle & Fitness
author: Matthew G Kadey; Briley
description: Supplements aren't the only way to boost your performance, try these natural drinks to give you unique benefits in and outside of the gym.
cleaned_text: Pressure The bounty of vitamin C in this juice can help keep your blood pressure from boiling over. Ingredients: - 13 whole pineapple, peeled - 1 mango, peeled - 12 medium jicama, peeled - 1 yellow bell pepper - 12 English cucumber - 13 cup fresh mint - 12 lime, peeled Per Brain Power Potent anthocyanin antioxidants, compounds that give red cabbage and blueberries their hue, may help boost brain function. Ingredients: - 2 cups red cabbage - 1 12 cups blueberries - 1 apple - 12 English cucumber - 12 lemon, peeled Per Serving: Calories: 154, Fat: No juicer? No problem! Place the chopped juice ingredients in a blender along with about 1 cup water and blend until smooth. Strain the mixture through a fine sieve, or drink it straight up if you don't mind a bit of pulp. for small blender containers, use half the ingredients called for in each juice.
